REUTERS.UNKNOWN: E F f0646 reute d f BC-DOME-MINES-<DM>-EXTEN 03-13 0048

TEXT.TITLE: DOME MINES <DM> EXTENDING PUBLIC OFFER DEADLINE
TEXT.BODY: Dome Mines Ltd said it was extending the closing date of its previously announced public offer of seven mln common shares to either March 19, pending registration of the shares under U.S. securities laws, or to March 27. Reuter
